data.message: your are my light wen im in complete darkness. your music makes me sane wen i feel like ima loose it!! your every word  in every song i can relate to in so many levels...idk how i woulda made it through my days if u never became the greatest rapper in history in my eyes...i thank u so much for being there wen i needed a voice of real talk! to hear...u are and always will b the best rapper alive to me.. got nthng but straight up love and respect for you eminem:)
